name: Little Splash
description:
Your mission is to complete the levels in as few attempts as possible. As you progress, more traps and objects are introduced, consequently the challenges become more complicated.

Main features:


  • Challenging levels with different color palettes.
  • Traps like saws, spikes, and collapsing platforms.
  • Helpful objects such as fans, jump pads, and treadmills.

And other secrets you need to play to discover them!
